Scouting Report - 22/23 Season

Busy and reliable as a tackler, with good speed and athleticism. Very intense and aware. Consistent and capable of regularly making both routine and big plays. Has good potential on special teams as well. Must keep working on his technique at getting away from big blockers. Can be a little over-focused on picking up runners and needs to show more consistency in blitz packages.

Long Range Potential: Quality exterior linebacker or wallk down saftey.
